1370: Gherelm moved to Tuytsteeg.A.0 after marriage.
Got married to Walburgis at age 23 in 1370.
1374: Had a son with Walburgis, Jonas, at age 27.
1377: Had a son with Walburgis, Thitardo, at age 30.
1378: Had a daughter with Walburgis, Scilla, at age 31.
1381: Had a son with Walburgis, Ingel, at age 34.
1383: Had a daughter with Walburgis, Gheesen, at age 36.
1384: Lost his wife Walburgis while she was giving birth to Truden in 1384.
Became caretaker of Jonas, Thitardo, Scilla, Ingel, Gheesen, Truden at age 38.
1386: Lost daughter Scilla when Scilla was 9 years old.
